author: Rhythen

text:
@gator159 I agree. The endless possibilities of the Virtual Console have been completely squandered.
It could have finally localized many games, such as Custom Robo, Nazo no Murasame Jou, Joy Mech Fight, Sutte Hakkun, and more.
It could have given us unreleased or limited release games, such as Earth Bound (official translation of Mother), Star Fox 2, BS The Legend of Zelda, and so on.
Instead, it's been used to sell us games that everyone has already played. Just the popular stuff.
